attributes.action: Relax Sunday trading laws for Supermarkets to open tills early for NHS workers.
attributes.additional_details: NHS workers need to get essential supplies but also need to abide recommendations on social distancing. Today my supermarket was so full that the queue stretched around the perimeter the whole store then snaked around in the lobby area.
attributes.background: Relax Sunday trading laws temporarily for NHS/ Key workers to shop during the Covid 19 epidemic .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302665

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
